mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goal ( member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, start_date, end_date, click_per_progress, is_completed, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{goalType}, #{title}, #{targetValue}, #{progressValue}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{clickPerProgress}, #{isCompleted}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, start_date, end_date, click_per_progress, is_completed, created_at, updated_at FROM goal WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND goal_type = #{goalType} ORDER BY is_completed DESC, created_at DESC -- 정렬조건 고민

SELECT id, member_id, goal_type, title, target_value, progress_value, start_date, end_date, click_per_progress, is_completed, created_at, updated_at FROM goal WHERE id = #{goalId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE goal
title = #{title},
target_value = #{targetValue},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
click_per_progress = #{clickPerProgress},
updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = #{id} AND member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE goal SET progress_value = #{progressValue}, is_completed = #{isCompleted}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND member_id = #{memberId}
